text: (ai rasool) banee isaraeel ko vah vakt bhee yaad dilao jab ibaraaheem ko unake paravaradigaar ne chand baaton mein aazamaaya aur unhonne poora kar diya to khuda ne pharamaaya main tumako (logon ka) peshava banaane vaala hoon (hazarat ibaraaheem ne) arz kee aur meree aulaad mein se pharamaaya (haan magar) mere is ahad par zaalimon mein se koee shakhs faayaz nahin ho sakata
